name: ROBLOX "This game is uncopylocked" n "VIP Servers"
description:
adds "this game is uncopylocked" below stats of a game and renames "Private Servers" to "VIP Servers" for the nostalgia
code made by Mystery Channel and xammand: https://userstyles.org/users/1185261 (Mystery Channel) https://userstyles.world/user/xammand (xammand), respect them.
meant to be used with ROBLOX 2015 Theme by snoopy3909isback.
